title: School/Local Level Awareness
description: Students learn about Olympiads through schools, clubs, MIN outreach, or self-discovery.
actions: Understand the math topics in the curriculum, identify topics required for Olympiads, and start basic problem solving.

title: District Mathematics Olympiad (DMO)
description: First formal selection stage; open to school students.
actions: Study prealgebra, algebra, number theory basics, geometry, combinatorics

title: Provincial Mathematics Olympiad (PMO)
description: Higher difficulty; selects for national level.
actions: Deepen knowledge in algebra, number theory, geometry, combinatorics; timed practice papers.

title: Nepal Mathematical Olympiad (NMO)
description: National competition; top scorers shortlisted for training.
actions: Learn rigorous proofs; solve harder problems; attempt past Top 100 problems.

title: National Camp & Selection Test
description: Intensive training by MIN; final team chosen.
focusAreas: All four major areas at IMO level
actions: Full mock Olympiads, advanced theory, weak area improvement.

title: International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)
description: Nepalâ€™s team represents the country internationally.
actions: Solve IMO past papers, strategize problem selection, manage time effectively.
